data.comment: Birmingham kick-off to get the first-half underway.
At Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium, Rob Dickie has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 30, The home team have replaced Lee Wallace with Niko Hamalainen. This is the first substitution made today by Mark Warburton.
Simon Hooper blows to end the first-half.
QPR kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 68, Chris Willock is replacing Albert Adomah for QPR at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium.
The home team replace Lyndon Dykes with Dominic Ball.
Aitor Karanka is making the team's first substitution at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium with Lukas Jutkiewicz replacing Jonathan Leko.
In the minute 77, Aitor Karanka (Birmingham) is making a second substitution, with Ivan Sanchez replacing Scott Hogan.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
